required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Combination of PECS II Block and Parasternal Block for Radical Mastectomy
clinical_study.official_title: The Combination of PECS II Block and Parasternal Block Provide Useful Analgesia After Radical Mastectomy With Axillary Dissection and Implant Breast Reconstruction

brief_summary.textblock: The combination of PECS II and parasternal Block provides analgesia after radical mastectomy

detailed_description.textblock: The cambionation of PECS II block and parasternal block

primary_outcome.description: Postoperative pain evaluated with Numeric Rate Scale, from 0 (no pain) to 10 (worst pain)

secondary_outcome.time_frame: From start to the end of surgery
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patients needing of equianalgesic mg of intraoperative morphine
Number of patients needing of equianalgesic mg of postoperative morphine
Number of patients with postoperative nausea and vomiting

arm_group.description: The combination of PECS II and parasternal block performed by injecting Levobupivacaine 0.375% 40 ml, injected between minor and major pectoralis muscles, between minor and serratus muscles and between major and intercostal muscles

intervention.description: 10 ml of Levobupivacaine 0.375% injected between minor and major pectoralis muscles. 20 ml of Levobupivacaine 0.375% injected between minor and serratus muscles. 10 ml of Levobupivacaine 0.375% injected between major and intercostal muscles at II and IV intercostal space.
intervention.other_name: Pectoral nerve block II type and parasternal block

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- ASA status patients:1,2 and 3
- patients undergoing to radical mastectomy with axillary dissection and breast-implant reconstruction
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients with allergy to local anesthetics
- ASA status patients: 4
- breast anatomy abnormalities
- neurological diseases
- septic conditions
- coagulopathies
- drug abuse history

overall_official.affiliation: San Salvatore Academic Hospital of L'Aquila

clinical_study.keyword: PECS II block, parasternal block, analgesia
